name: 2023 the 5th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Vehicle Engineering
content: Publication: All submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by technical committee and reviewers of the conference. Accepted paper will be included into International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR, ISSN: 2278-0149), which will be indexed by Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
